data.author: Wayne Dyer
data.quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.

data.author: John Burroughs
data.quote: Leap, and the net will appear.

data.author: Norman Vincent Peale
data.quote: It’s always too early to quit

data.author: Benjamin Franklin
data.quote: Well done is better than well said.

data.author: Victor Kiam
data.quote: Even if you fall on your face you’re still moving forward.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

data.author: Nelson Mandela
data.quote: It always seems impossible until it is done.

data.author: Eric Thomas
data.quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe,33 then you’ll be successful.

data.author: Robert H. Schuller
data.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.

data.author: Tim Notke
data.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.

data.author: Spryte Loriano
data.quote: Every great story on the planet happened when someone decided not to give up, but kept going no matter what.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. STOP when you are DONE.

data.author: Og Mandino
data.quote: ailure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

data.author: Conrad Hilton
data.quote: Success… seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don’t quit.

data.author: W. Clement Stone
data.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

data.author: Pablo Picasso
data.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don’t wish it were easier, wish you were better.

data.author: Ayn Rand
data.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.

data.author: Herbert Simon
data.quote: One finds limits by pushing them.
